chara.textHome:
I get so nervous whenever
someone talks to me...

I guess I'm just so bad at socializing
that I can't calm down...  It was like that
the first time I met Leila and Mito, too.

The only difference then was that I felt
I wanted to be friends with them.

I don't know what you're supposed to
say when you just pass by someone...

I end up greeting them, then there's an
awkward silence, and we leave after that...
Ughhh, so embarrassing...
I'm glad... Now I can fight better. Yeah!
I've taken another step up the ladder...
I can keep climbing, I think!

Since I was little I've never
been good at talking to people...
Anyway, I like being on my own.
Even when I'm at home.

I've never met anyone like
Mito or Leila before.

From the moment we met and up until now,
they've looked me straight in the eye
and accepted everything about me.

That's what made me want
to talk with them more.
Oh, um, hello...
Uh, anyway, nice to meet you.
I'm sorry I'm like this...

I guess you could say...
I have, er, social anxiety.

To be honest, I'm bad at waking up
every morning.

But Leila and Mito are energetic
as soon as they get up,

so their energy rubs off on me a little
I guess.
I end up daydreaming a lot during class.

But it seems I have a serious expression
on my face while doing it,
so I never get caught.

I walk home from school with
Leila and Mito most of the time.

But sometimes Mito says stuff like, 
"Let's walk only in the shadows
on the way home."

I always stay up later than I should.
Once I start reading books or comics,
it's hard to stop...
But it's so much fun!

It might seem wasteful to just let
time pass without doing anything.

But every now and then,
that's how I like to spend my time.

It's a Magical Girl's destiny
to fight Witches...
I fully understand that.
All that's left to do is fulfill that destiny!
This place isn't normal.
One slip up and I'll lose my footing.
That's what it feels like!

Baking with Leila,
playing Mito's made-up games...

Whatever we end up doing together,
I feel complete when I'm spending
time with those two.

A lot of people tell me I'm calm,
but that's not true.

I worry nonstop whether people think
I'm boring and stuff.
I usually read a lot when I'm at home.
But lately, I've started to work out.
It's pretty addictive!

I get nervous a lot when I'm outside,
so I like to let my mind go blank
when I'm at home.
I just stop thinking...and then...
Oh!
Excuse me, my mind went blank.
Get a white sheet of paper and a pencil.
Then dot the sheet over and over.
It's actually pretty easy to get immersed in.

I tried playing a word chain game
by myself once.
But the game wouldn't end, so I quit...

I guess I shouldn't have been
surprised by that.

When I'm sitting quietly alone in my room,
I hear all kinds of noises from outside
my window.
It's fun to imagine what's making them!

What should I say when
I call out to someone?
Something like, "Yo"?
Oh, i-is that weird?!
*Sigh*
I just don't know..

Let's head towards the sun!
While skipping! Yeah...
Oh! Did you hear me say that?!

It's a line from the drama
"The Tale of the Skipping Teacher".
I...I have to do this myself!
Thank goodness, we won.
We have to keep this up!
I'll try hard next time, too!
Just trust in yourself, and keep going!
U-um...I...I'm Seika...Kumi...
N-nice to, um, meet you...
Ummm...yeah, s-so uh, let's...get along.

Wow! So this is what it feels
like to get stronger!

Maybe I'm imagining it,
but I got pretty strong, didn't I?

Time keeps moving on,
from the past to the future...
So I need to keep moving, too!

When I'm in town and I see someone,
even someone I know,

I always end up doubling back
to avoid them...
Just seeing their face gets my heart racing...

When I run into someone unexpectedly,
I have no idea what to say to them.

So whenever someone notices me,
I get surprised and probably look funny...
